contentfulSiteSettings.heroBio: Consider the holistic power of herbs and experience the healthy effects of our earth.
contentfulSiteSettings.feature1Text: You won't believe all the things that feature one has in store. Check out this icon above me.
contentfulSiteSettings.feature2Text: It's really quite unbelievable. You won't believe all the things that feature two has in store.
contentfulSiteSettings.feature3Text: Can you feel it? That's the power of herbs healing your body. Really, it's true.
